Texts.Chs: 出色极了。现在我终于可以好好探索这个冰冻住的地狱了。作为承诺：这是^green;你的报酬^reset;
Texts.Eng: Excellent. Now I can really cut my teeth on exploring this frozen hell. As promised: ^green;your payment^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 简述：我需要更好的装备以应付外面的寒冷气候，^orange;超致密头盔^orange;是最适合的.我会为这些材料慷慨地赔偿你的损失。
Texts.Eng: Simply put: I need better protection for the cold outside. A ^orange;Densinium Helm^orange; would be perfect. I would handsomely compensate you for the materials.
